Articles.Content:
Hello everyone !

I\'ve been dwelling around here since KSP 0.10 (not SO much) and never dared to register nor write a post. But with the announcement of KSP 0.14 I\'d realize I would need to become more social, so I just made a fresh new pre-order and registered the store and the forums. Many many thanks to all people in the forums with their tips and mods but specially, I want to thank Harv and his team (of course) for making such a simple yet advanced approach to space exploration game and the NovaSilisko team for making such a good model parts. Oh I almost forgot, I\'m spanish so maybe you would have to bare with my english a little bit with me. I promise it wouldn\'t be too tough, but expect some -hard to read- kind of statements from time to time.

Thank you everyone again, and let\'s get this thread moving! 8)
Welcome to the community, glad to have you aboard!

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager

Welcome! :cheers:

Hah, I can\'t find any errors in your writing, you have awesome english.

Such a warm welcome! :-[ Thanks everyone!

Hah' date=' I can\'t find any errors in your writing, you have awesome english.

If you\'re refering to ortographical errors, that\'s right I don\'t tend to mess too much with that. It\'s sintactical errors (complex phrase building and some issues with verbs and verbal timing) with I struggle with.

Welcome to the forums.

Hope you enjoy yourself.

-Mincespy
